# cyclinbayes

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Cyclinbayes is a R package that provides two bayesian methods for estimating directed acyclic graphs (DAG) and directed cyclic graphs (DCG).
## Installation

You can install the development version of cyclinbayes from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
#remotes::install_github("roblee01/cyclinbayes")
```

## Example

This is an example how to solve 

```{r example}
library(cyclinbayes)

generates_examples(5,0.9,TRUE)




## basic example code
```
